column4: I am completely new to Ubuntu.  It took me an hour to figure out how to get this chat program installed.  Is there anyone who can help me uninstall firefox 1.? and install firefox 2 using GNOME as the GUI?
I am using 6.06.  I was having problems getting the latest version installed.
As for the chat that is preinstalled...not too intuitive.
if you are talking about xchat-gnome it does suck, install straigt xchat instead
